title: 求助如何禁止普通玩家建造暮色森林传送门？
author: Peanny
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Peanny 于 2014-2-12 13:14 编辑 

如题 希望有高人做出解答。

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
Peanny 发表于 2014-2-12 14:23
bukkit.yml  server  spigot  wepif都找了没看到呢。。
config\TwilightForest.cfg
？？？关掉开门仪式相关，官方的直接用传送门物品方块，不知道行不

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content:
948587022 发表于 2014-2-12 13:38
？？？关掉开门仪式相关，官方的直接用传送门物品方块，不知道行不
怎么关？我去试试？

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content: 有没有大神能给解决一下子啊

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content: 一个会的也没有吗。。。QAQ这不科学啊

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2014-2-12 14:10
改服务端配置文件
能详细说明吗。。刚才找了半天没找到 还是版主给力！

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
# Disable Twilight Forest portal creation entirely.  Provided for server operators looking to restrict action to the dimension.
    B:DisablePortalCreation=false改成true

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2014-2-12 14:15
# Disable Twilight Forest portal creation entirely.  Provided for server operators looking to re ...
bukkit.yml  server  spigot  wepif都找了没看到呢。。

replies.author: Peanny
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2014-2-12 12:59
config\TwilightForest.cfg
完美 解决 版主威武！！
